By Jack_Insanity on Wednesday, July 27, 2005 - 03:33 pm:

Sincerely,
Lor

By Infernus on Wednesday, July 27, 2005 - 05:59 pm:

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): FAQ: Training Gadgets & Ranch Upgrades

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Items: Medicines, Antiques, Luxuries, Toys, and Other items

Information about medals on the bottom of both sections. BOTH. You could've caught that if you had read before posting. I reccomend doing that before you post any more, by the way.

Level 4 gadgets can be found pretty much anywhere. You just need the right tablet (try for silver, gold, or stat specific).
